scenes.name: start
text: It is a dark and stormy night.[pause 15]
You stand in a dark room, watching the raindrops hit the window.[pause 15]
[if inv.Newspaper==0]On the table in front of you is a newspaper. [s1]Novel.js[/s], says the headline.[pause 15][/if]

choices.text: Cut to the chase and check the [s1]Novel.js[/s] GitHub repo

scenes.name: newspaper
text: You pick up the newspaper. What is this "Novel.js" you keep hearing about?[pause 10]
Some kind of text adventure framework, you figure out. And written in JavaScript, no less.[pause 10]
Scrolling text with customizable speed, conditional statements, multiple inventories, checkpoints, sound effects, saving... [pause 15]All sorts of useful features![pause 10]

scenes.name: umbrella
scenes.text: [if inv.Umbrella==0]You can't find your umbrella! You should probably try harder.[/if][if inv.Umbrella==1]You found your umbrella![/if][if inv.Umbrella>1][pause 30].[pause 30].[pause 30]. [pause 40].... Another umbrella?[/if]
